message:
Excellent approach with NotifyTaskCompletion. I've used it many times, but now I have an issue related to it. In one scenario my service should return a list of some objects which I use later but on load I need to show the sum of some property of objects in the list. The only approach I come with is the subscribing to PropertyChanged event of NotifyTaskCompletion and raise PropertyChaned event of the property which should calculate the sum when I am receiving event of IsSuccessfullyCompleted. IMO it is an ugly solution. Can you suggest any other one or have you any thoughts?

Thanks in advance.
